name: MaaVindhyavasini Engineering
overview:
Established in the year 2002, we, “Maa Vindhyavasini Engineering Company”, are one of the leading organizations, engaged in trading and supplying a comprehensive range of AC, DC & PMDC Motors, Hollow Shafts, Blowers and Impelars.

Our Team: Procuring agents Engineers Technicians Sales and marketing executives Skilled and semi-skilled labor

Our Quality Assurance: Being a quality-driven organization, we strive for maintaining highest standards of quality in each product. For this reason, we source our entire range of AC, DC & PMDC Motors, Hollow Shafts, Blowers and Impelars from the authorized and trusted vendors of the market. These vendors develop all the products in strict compliance with international quality norms & standards.

Vendors Base: To meet the specific requirements and demands of our clients, we have associated with some certified and reliable vendors of the market. These vendors manufacture all the products using high-grade raw material and modern machinery along with the latest technology to ensure that the final output meets with international quality norms & standards.

Client Satisfaction: Since our inception, all our endeavors are directed towards achieving the highest level of customer satisfaction by providing them with a qualitative range of AC, DC & PMDC Motors, Hollow Shafts, Blowers and Impelars. We also provide the facility of customized packaging to our clients for wining their trust in us.
